title: malarpAdamE mAlmaruganE
sahitya:
malarpAdamE malmaruganE mayilvAhana guruparanE


anupallavi

  pulavar prANanigaL pugazhum kandanE puNya vaDivAi tigazhum dEvanE


caraNam    Adi antamillA vEda rUpanE AdharamAga aNDiyavarai kAppavanE
jyOti aruL tanda shivabAlane siddargaL tozhum bharaNi deivamE
